text: DON'T MISS 'It wasn't a showmance for ME': Bianca Gascoigne throws dig at CBB ex Jamie O'Hara... as she shows him what he's missing in very sexy lingerie shoot 'Happy Valentine's Day, gorgeous baby daddy-to-be': Pregnant Binky Felstead puckers up to shirtless beau Josh 'JP' Patterson in romantic snap PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Borrowed from racy Rosie? Kim Kardashian receives a posy of red roses from a smitten fan as she enjoys a night out in New York Smelling of roses 'You're the best!' Jamie Oliver leads the Valentine's Day tributes as he shares twenty year old throwback snap of beloved wife Jools Love is in the air Cold Feet's James Nesbitt reflects on the demise of his 22-year marriage to wife Sonia... as he credits £20k hair transplant with reinvigorating his career 'Saddened' Tamara Beckwith is pictured for the first time since her friend Tara Palmer-Tomkinson died... as she cuddles up to son Vero on ski slopes in Gstaad Nothing desperate here! Eva Longoria sizzles in figure-flaunting grey jeans and daring turtleneck as she steps out in LA Never looked better Tom Holland and Ella Purnell spark dating rumours as they get 'very close' at BAFTA afterparty... before 'heading back to his hotel together' Kylie Jenner flashes a hint of underboob in heavily embellished white mini dress and flat thigh high boots at Phillipp Plein NYFW show Madonna puts on a playful display at Phillipp Plein's NYFW show as she makes her first public appearance since adopting Malawian twins From family to fashion 'It puts a puts a big smile on my face': Pregnant Binky Felstead showcases eternity ring her late dad gave to her mum in emotional Instagram post 'Our relationship is a little wobbly at times': Louise Thompson and Ryan Libbey wear matching clothing as they share yet another cringey exercise video Katherine Jenkins seen for the first time following David Beckham's email hacking scandal brushing off the drama with a smile in Wales 'We won't perform for a few years': Una Healy wears VERY risqué dress and reveals there are no plans for The Saturdays to reform anytime soon On a different track: Haley Bennett debuts chic new pixie cut as she looks worlds away from her The Girl On The Train persona Chop and change 'All that money, but can't clean her windows!' Katie Price is mocked for 'Happy Xmas' scrawling seen in her home... SEVEN WEEKS after season Ellie Bamber stuns in a dazzling bardot fifties inspired prom dress as she hits the red carpet at the ELLE Style Awards Retro glamour 'They have a crazy connection:' New couple The Weeknd and Selena Gomez are said to be 'falling for each other' after weeks of dating Weeknd vibes Matt LeBlanc beams while posing alongside Top Gear co-hosts in first promo shot for new season... as show returns without embattled Chris Evans Bella Hadid poses in a sports bra and leggings as she's announced as the new face of luxury watch brand TAG Heuer She maintains her trim figure with boxing My little cub!
